post.author: 최덕선
post.content:
When: January 7-8, 2003 Where: Toronto Congress Centre, 650 Dixon Road
Space is limited! Register Now for this FREE EVENT www.sun.com/developers/techdays or phone 888-325-0159.
Sun Microsystems is helping to define the next era of technology. Join us for Sun Tech Days, our annual Developer Conference featuring keynote speaker, Dr. James Gosling, Vice President and Sun Fellow for Sun Microsystems. Dr. Gosling is the lead engineer and key architect behind the development of the Java programming language and platform.
You'll experience a unique global gathering of industry leaders representing cutting-edge systems such as Java Web services, Java 2 Enterprise Edition and the hottest software in between. Sun Tech Days is your opportunity to embark on a quest for information.
Registration and continental breakfast begin at 7:30am each day.
There will be FREE giveaways just for attending (shoulder bag with $$$ free software, opportunities to win a Palm and MP3).
REGISTER at: www.sun.com/developers/techdays
post.title: SUN TECH DAYS - A DEVELOPER CONFERENCE Happy new year!!!
